cryptics.text: 'A bag belt only?', he asked his balding brothers.
cryptics.answer: Talk to Abbot Langley in the monastery near Edgeville.

cryptics.text: Aggie I see, Lonely and southern I feel I am neither inside nor outside the house yet no house would be complete without me. The treasure lies beneath me!
cryptics.answer: Dig outside the window of Aggie the Witch's house in Draynor Village.

cryptics.text: A great view - watch the rapidly drying hides get splashed. Check the box you are sitting on.
cryptics.answer: Almera's house north of Baxtorian Falls, search the boxes on the 1st floor[UK].

cryptics.text: AIQ 0440
cryptics.answer: Dig 4 steps east and 4 steps south of the centre of the fairy ring (Mudskipper Point).

cryptics.text: AIR 2331
cryptics.answer: Dig 2 steps east and 1 step south of the centre of the fairy ring.

cryptics.text: ALP 1140
cryptics.answer: Dig 1 step east and 3 steps south of the centre of the fairy ring by the Lighthouse.

cryptics.text: And so on, and so on, and so on. Walking from the land of many unimportant things leads to a choice of paths.
cryptics.answer: Dig on Etceteria next to the evergreen tree in front of the castle walls.

cryptics.text: Between where the best are commemorated for a year, and a celebratory cup, not just for beer.
cryptics.answer: Dig at the Clan Cup Trophy at Clan Wars.

cryptics.text: BIP 7013
cryptics.answer: Dig 6 steps north and 3 steps west of the centre of the fairy ring (Fairytale II - Cure a Queen or 50 Agility required).

cryptics.text: BJR 1123
cryptics.answer: Dig 1 steps south and 2 steps west of the centre of the fairy ring. Partial completion of the Holy Grail quest is required to enter this area.

cryptics.text: BLP 6200
cryptics.answer: Dig 6 steps north and 2 steps east of the centre of the fairy ring.

cryptics.text: CIS 0009
cryptics.answer: Dig 9 steps west of the centre of the fairy ring. Fairy Ring Code CIS (You can also use Skills necklace to teleport to the Woodcutting Guild and run north), (or use games necklace to teleport to Wintertodt camp and walk south.)

cryptics.text: Citric cellar.
cryptics.answer: Speak to Heckel Funch on the 1st floor[UK] in the Grand Tree.

cryptics.text: CKP 0224
cryptics.answer: Dig 2 steps south and 2 steps west of the centre of the fairy ring. Fairy Ring Code CKP

cryptics.text: Come have a cip with this great soot covered denizen.
cryptics.answer: Talk to Miner Magnus east of the fairy ring (code cip). Answer: 8

cryptics.text: Come to the evil ledge, Yew know yew want to. Try not to get stung.
cryptics.answer: Dig in Edgeville, just east of the southern yew tree.

cryptics.text: Covered in shadows, the centre of the circle is where you will find the answer.
cryptics.answer: Dig in the centre of Mort'ton, where the roads intersect. Just south of Razmire Keelgan.

cryptics.text: Dig where 4 siblings and I all live with our evil overlord.
cryptics.answer: Dig in the chicken pen inside the Champions' Guild. Requires 32 quest points to enter.

cryptics.text: DIP 8511
cryptics.answer: Dig 7 steps north and 4 steps east of the centre of the fairy ring.

cryptics.text: DKS 2310
cryptics.answer: Dig 1 step north and 3 steps east of the centre of the fairy ring (north east of Rellekka).

cryptics.text: Four blades I have, yet draw no blood; Still I turn my prey to powder. If you are brave, come search my roof; It is there my blades are louder.
cryptics.answer: Lumbridge windmill, search the crates on the top floor.

cryptics.text: Generally speaking, his nose was very bent.
cryptics.answer: Talk to General Bentnoze, found in the topmost part of Goblin Village; he'll give you a puzzle box.

cryptics.text: Gold I see, yet gold I require. Give me 875 if death you desire.
cryptics.answer: Speak to Saniboch at the Brimhaven Dungeon entrance.

cryptics.text: He knows just how easy it is to lose track of time.
cryptics.answer: Speak to Brother Kojo in the Clock Tower. Answer: 22.

cryptics.text: His head might be hollow, but the crates nearby are filled with surprises.
cryptics.answer: Search the crates near the Clay golem in the ruins of Uzer.

cryptics.text: I'd like to hear some music. Come and see me on the bridge in Falador Park, and play: <some music> Thanks, Cecilia
cryptics.answer: Speak to Cecilia, who is located on the bridge in Falador Park.

cryptics.text: I am a token of the greatest love. I have no beginning or end. My eye is red, I can fit like a glove. Go to the place where it's money they lend, And dig by the gate to be my friend.
cryptics.answer: Dig by the gate in the basement of the West Varrock bank.

cryptics.text: Identify the back of this over-acting brother. (He's a long way from home.)
cryptics.answer: Talk to Hamid, the monk at the altar in the Duel Arena. You will receive a puzzle box.

cryptics.text: If a man carried my burden, he would break his back. I am not rich, but leave silver in my track. Speak to the keeper of my trail.
cryptics.answer: Speak to Gerrant in the fish shop in Port Sarim.

cryptics.text: If you look closely enough, it seems that the archers have lost more than their needles.
cryptics.answer: Search the haystack by the south corner of the Rangers' Guild. You need level 40 Ranged to access it.

cryptics.text: I have many arms but legs, I have just one, I have little family but my seed, You can grow on, I am not dead, yet I am but a spirit, and my power on your quests, you will earn the right to free it.
cryptics.answer: Spirit tree in Tree Gnome Village. Answer: 13112221

cryptics.text: I lie lonely and forgotten in mid wilderness, where the dead rise from their beds. Feel free to quarrel and wind me up and dig while you shoot their heads.
cryptics.answer: Directly under the crossbow respawn in the Graveyard of Shadows in level 18 Wilderness.

cryptics.text: In the city where merchants are said to have lived, talk to a man with a splendid cape, but a hat dropped by goblins.
cryptics.answer: Talk to the head chef in Cooks' Guild west of Varrock. Remember to wear a Chef's Hat.

cryptics.text: It seems to have reached the end of the line, and it's still empty.
cryptics.answer: Search the carts in the northern part of the Dwarven Mine.

cryptics.text: I watch the sea. I watch you fish. I watch your tree.
cryptics.answer: Speak to Ellena at Catherby fruit tree patch.

cryptics.text: Leader of the Yak City.
cryptics.answer: Talk to Mawnis Burowgar in Neitiznot. Fremennik Isles jester part required.

cryptics.text: Mine was the strangest birth under the sun. I left the crimson sack, yet life had not begun. Entered the world, and yet was seen by none.
cryptics.answer: Inside Karamja Volcano, dig directly underneath the red spiders' eggs respawn.

cryptics.text: Must be full of railings.
cryptics.answer: Search the boxes around the hut where the broken dwarf cannon is, close to the start of the Dwarf Cannon quest (Northwest of the Fishing Guild).

cryptics.text: My giant guardians below the market streets would be fans of rock and roll, if only they could grab hold of it. Dig near my green bubbles!
cryptics.answer: Dig near the cauldron by moss giants under Varrock Sewers. A slash weapon or knife is required to navigate through the sewers. Players with 51 Agility can use the shortcut pipe from Edgeville Dungeon to direct access the clue location; a slash weapon or knife is not required in this case.

cryptics.text: My home is grey, and made of stone; A castle with a search for a meal. Hidden in some drawers I am, across from a wooden wheel.
cryptics.answer: Open the drawers inside the room with the spinning wheel on the first floor of Lumbridge Castle.

cryptics.text: My name is like a tree, yet it is spelt with a 'g'. Come see the fur which is right near me.
cryptics.answer: Speak to Wilough, next to the fur merchant in Varrock Square.

cryptics.text: Often sought out by scholars of histories past, find me where words of wisdom speak volumes.
cryptics.answer: Speak to an examiner at the Exam Centre. You might need to talk to several different examiners.

cryptics.text: Probably filled with books on magic.
cryptics.answer: Search the bookcase in the basement of Wizards' Tower.

cryptics.text: Read 'How to breed scorpions.' By O.W.Thathurt.
cryptics.answer: Search the northern bookcase on the 1st floor[UK] of the Sorcerer's Tower.

cryptics.text: Rotting next to a ditch. Dig next to the fish.
cryptics.answer: Dig next to a fishing spot on the south-east side of Burgh de Rott.

cryptics.text: 'Small shoe.' Often found with rod on mushroom.
cryptics.answer: Talk to any Gnome trainer in the Agility area of the Tree Gnome Stronghold.

cryptics.text: Snah? I feel all confused, like one of those cakes...
cryptics.answer: Talk to Hans roaming around Lumbridge Castle.

cryptics.text: Surprising? I bet he is...
cryptics.answer: Talk to Sir Prysin in Varrock Palace.

cryptics.text: Surviving.
cryptics.answer: Talk to Sir Vyvin on the 2nd floor[UK] of Falador Castle (east side).

cryptics.text: The beasts to my east snap claws and tails, The rest to my west can slide and eat fish. The force to my north will jump and they'll wail, Come dig by my fire and make a wish.
cryptics.answer: Dig by the torch in the Ardougne Zoo, between the penguins and the scorpions.

cryptics.text: The cheapest water for miles around, but they react badly to religious icons.
cryptics.answer: Search the crates in the General Store tent in the Bandit Camp, south of the Bedabin Camp.

cryptics.text: The effects of this fire are magnified.
cryptics.answer: Dig by the fire beside Ket'sal K'uk in the westernmost part of the Kebos Swamp.

cryptics.text: The keeper of Melzars...Spare? Skeleton? Anar?
cryptics.answer: Speak to Oziach in Edgeville.

cryptics.text: The King's magic won't be wasted by me.
cryptics.answer: Talk to the Guardian mummy inside the Pyramid Plunder minigame in Sophanem. Partial completion of Icthlarin's Little Helper is required.

cryptics.text: The magic of 4 colours, an early experience you could learn. The large beast caged up top, rages, as his demised kin's loot now returns.
cryptics.answer: Speak to Wizard Mizgog at the top of the Wizards' Tower south of Draynor.

cryptics.text: The mother of the reptilian sacrifice.
cryptics.answer: Talk to Zul-Cheray in a house near the sacrificial boat at Zul-Andra.

cryptics.text: There is no 'worthier' lord.
cryptics.answer: Speak to Lord Iorwerth in the elven camp near Prifddinas. He will give you a puzzle box to solve.

cryptics.text: THEY'RE EVERYWHERE!!!! But they were here first. Dig for treasure where the ground is rich with ore.
cryptics.answer: Dig at Barbarian Village, next to the Stronghold of Security.

cryptics.text: This aviator is at the peak of his profession.
cryptics.answer: Captain Bleemadge, the gnome glider pilot, is found at the top of White Wolf Mountain.

cryptics.text: This village has a problem with cartloads of the undead. Try checking the bookcase to find an answer.
cryptics.answer: Search the bookcase by the doorway of the building just south-east of the Shilo Village Gem Mine.

cryptics.text: When no weapons are at hand, then is the time to reflect. In Saradomin's name, redemption draws closer...
cryptics.answer: On Entrana, search the southern drawer in the house with the cooking range on the western side of the island.

cryptics.text: When you get tired of fighting, go deep, deep down until you need an antidote.
cryptics.answer: Go to Yanille Agility dungeon and fall into the place with the poison spiders, either by repeatedly walking across the balancing ledge (level 40 Agility required) or praying at the altar of Zamorak. Search the crate by the stairs leading up.

cryptics.text: You have all of the elements available to solve this clue. Fortunately you do not have to go as far as to stand in a draft.
cryptics.answer: Requirements: Started Elemental Workshop I. Search the crate, just west of the Air elementals, inside the Elemental Workshop. Note: A battered key is required to enter to workshop.

cryptics.text: You will need to under-cook to solve this one.
cryptics.answer: Search the crate in the Lumbridge basement.

cryptics.text: A demon's best friend holds the next step of this clue.
cryptics.answer: Kill a hellhound. Note: Killing Cerberus or hellhounds inside the God Wars Dungeon does not count.

cryptics.text: A Guthixian ring lies between two peaks. Search the stones and you'll find what you seek.
cryptics.answer: Search the stones several steps west of the Guthixian stone circle in Taverley, search the stones.

cryptics.text: A reck you say; let's pray there aren't any ghosts.
cryptics.answer: Speak to Father Aereck in Lumbridge.

cryptics.text: A ring of water surrounds 4 powerful rings. Dig by the ladder that is located there.
cryptics.answer: Dig by the ladder leading to the Dagannoth Kings' room in the Waterbirth Island Dungeon.

cryptics.text: Desert insects is what I see, Taking care of them was my responsibility. Your solution is found by digging near me.
cryptics.answer: Dig next to the entomologist, in the Kalphite Cave east of Shantay Pass.

cryptics.text: Dig under Razorlor's toad batta.
cryptics.answer: Dig on the toad batta spawn in Tarn's Lair. See this map for directions. From the entrance, follow the route C-K, or, alternatively, D-S-Q-P-O-N-M-L. Or faster: from the Slayer ring teleport, east, jump west past mages, get pushed by wall crushers, south, south, west, west, south, search the tile (floor) to deactivate the log trap and jump over, south, south, "go down", but you'll fall right where the toad batta is.

cryptics.text: Dig where the forces of Zamorak and Saradomin collide.
cryptics.answer: Dig next to the law rift in the Abyss, in the north-east section.

cryptics.text: Dig in the middle of the Warrior's Guild entrance hall
cryptics.answer: Dig in the middle of the entrance hall

cryptics.text: Dobson is my last name, and with gardening I seek fame.
cryptics.answer: Horacio, located in the garden of the Handelmort Mansion in East Ardougne.

cryptics.text: Does one really need a fire to stay warm here?
cryptics.answer: Located next to the fire near the Volcanic Mine entrance on the Fossil Island Volcano.

cryptics.text: Even the seers say this clue goes right over their heads.
cryptics.answer: Search the crate on the Seers' Village Agility Course. Requires 60 Agility (can be boosted from 55 with a Summer pie).

cryptics.text: Ghostly bones.
cryptics.answer: Kill an Ankou, which can be found on the 4th level of Stronghold of Security, the Stronghold Slayer Cave, the Catacombs of Kourend, and The Forgotten Cemetery.

cryptics.text: Green is the colour of my death as the winter-guise, I swoop towards the ground.
cryptics.answer: Required: Sled.png, partial completion of Troll Romance. Players need to slide down to where Trollweiss grows on Trollweiss Mountain.

cryptics.text: His bark is worse than his bite.
cryptics.answer: Speak to Barker at Canifis's Barkers' Haberdashery.

cryptics.text: I am the one who watches the giants. The giants in turn watch me. I watch with two while they watch with one. Come seek where I may be.
cryptics.answer: Speak to Kamfreena on the top floor of the Warriors' Guild.

cryptics.text: I burn between heroes and legends.
cryptics.answer: Speak to the candle maker in Catherby.

cryptics.text: I live in a deserted crack collecting soles.
cryptics.answer: Enter the crack west of Nardah rug merchant, and talk to the genie. A rope and a lightsource are required (Spirits of the Elid required).

cryptics.text: In a while...
cryptics.answer: Kill a crocodile.

cryptics.text: Let's hope you don't meet a watery death when you encounter this fiend.
cryptics.answer: Kill a waterfiend.

cryptics.text: Mix yellow with blue and add heat, make sure you bring protection.
cryptics.answer: Kill a green dragon. Brutal green dragons do NOT count for this clue. Players who have completed Dragon Slayer II can use the Myths' Guild basement to kill green dragons outside the Wilderness.

cryptics.text: More resources than I can handle, but in a very dangerous area. Can't wait to strike gold!
cryptics.answer: Dig in the centre of the three gold rocks in the Resource Area deep in the Wilderness. An entry fee of 7,500 coins is required (6,000 if the medium Wilderness Diary is completed, 3,750 if the hard diary is completed, or free if the elite diary is completed).

cryptics.text: Observing someone in a swamp, under the telescope lies treasure.
cryptics.answer: Dig by the telescope in the island where Broken Handz can be found (fairy ring code dlr).

cryptics.text: Reflection is the weakness for these eyes of evil.
cryptics.answer: Kill a basilisk, which requires a mirror shield and 40 Slayer.

cryptics.text: Right on the blessed border, cursed by the evil ones. On the spot inaccessible by both; I will be waiting. The bugs' imminent possession holds the answer.
cryptics.answer: Dig right under the fairy ring located west of Filliman's grotto. The fairy ring code is bip. Players without access to fairy ring transport can use the shortcut to get to the island provided they have 50 Agility.

cryptics.text: Scattered coins and gems fill the floor. The chest you seek is in the north east.
cryptics.answer: Kill the King Black Dragon for a key (elite), and then open the closed chest in the north-east corner of the lair.

cryptics.text: 'See you in your dreams' said the vegetable man.
cryptics.answer: Speak to Dominic Onion at the Nightmare Zone teleport spot.

cryptics.text: Show this to Sherlock
cryptics.answer: Sherlock can be found south of Seers' Village. Players will have to perform one of the Sherlock tasks in order to complete this challenge.

cryptics.text: Speak to a Wyse man.
cryptics.answer: Talk to Wyson the gardener at Falador Park.

cryptics.text: Stop crying! Talk to the head.
cryptics.answer: Talk to the Head mourner in the Mourner Headquarters in West Ardougne. Starting Mourning's Ends Part I is required. Bring mourner gear, unless the player has a slayer ring, in which they can teleport to dark beasts and head east towards the headquarters.

cryptics.text: Surround my bones in fire, ontop the wooden pyre. Finally lay me to rest, before my one last test.
cryptics.answer: Kill a confused barbarian or lost barbarian within the Ancient Cavern to receive mangled bones. Construct a pyre ship and burn the bones onto the pyre with logs, a tinderbox, and an axe. Kill the ferocious barbarian spirit that spawns to receive the next clue.

cryptics.text: The beasts retreat, for their Queen is gone; the song of this town still plays on. Dig near the birthplace of a blade, be careful not to melt your spade.
cryptics.answer: (Requires full completion of the Swan Song quest. There is no need to accept the reward though!) Dig in front of the small furnace in the Piscatoris Fishing Colony.

cryptics.text: Three rule below and three sit at top. Come dig at my entrance.
cryptics.answer: Dig in front of the entrance to the Waterbirth Island Dungeon.

cryptics.text: Varrock is where I reside, not the land of the dead, but I am so old, I should be there instead. Let's hope your reward is as good as it says, just 1 gold one and you can have it read.
cryptics.answer: Talk to Gypsy Aris, west of Varrock Square.

cryptics.text: With a name like that, you'd expect a little more than just a few scimitars.
cryptics.answer: Speak to Daga on Ape Atoll.

cryptics.text: W marks the spot.
cryptics.answer: Dig in the middle of the Warriors' Guild entrance hall. To enter, a player must have their Attack and Strength levels add up to a total of 130 or have either one equal to 99.

cryptics.text: You'll get licked.
cryptics.answer: Kill a bloodveld. Mutated variants will not work.

cryptics.text: You'll have to plug your nose if you use this source of herbs.
cryptics.answer: Kill an aberrant spectre or deviant spectre and pick up the clue or casket that it drops.

cryptics.text: You might have to turn over a few stones to progress.
cryptics.answer: Kill a rock crab and pick up the casket or clue that it drops.

cryptics.text: You must be 100 to play with me.
cryptics.answer: Speak to the Veteran boat squire at Pest Control.

cryptics.text: You were 3 and I was the 6th. Come speak to me.
cryptics.answer: Speak to Vannaka in Edgeville Dungeon.

cryptics.text: You will have to fly high where a sword cannot help you.
cryptics.answer: Kill an aviansie.

cryptics.text: 2 musical birds. Dig in front of the spinning light.
cryptics.answer: Dig in front of the spinning light in Ping and Pong's room inside the Iceberg. A clockwork suit is required to enter the iceberg.

cryptics.text: A chisel and hammer reside in his home, strange for one of magic. Impress him with your magical equipment.
cryptics.answer: Wizard Cromperty at the north-east corner of East Ardougne. Speak to him while wearing equipment adding up to at least +100 in magical attack bonus.

cryptics.text: A dwarf, approaching death, but very much in the light.
cryptics.answer: Thorgel at the entrance to the Death altar. Requires partial completion of Mourning's Ends Part II.

cryptics.text: A massive battle rages beneath so be careful when you dig by the large broken crossbow.
cryptics.answer: North-east of the God Wars Dungeon entrance, climb the rocky handholds and dig by the large crossbow.

cryptics.text: Anger Abbot Langley.
cryptics.answer: Speak to Abbot Langley while you have a negative prayer bonus (currently only possible with an Ancient staff).

cryptics.text: Anger those who adhere to Saradomin's edicts to prevent travel.
cryptics.answer: Port Sarim docks, try to charter a ship to Entrana with armour or weapons equipped.

cryptics.text: Buried beneath the ground, who knows where it's found. Lucky for you, A man called Jorral may have a clue.
cryptics.answer: Speak to Jorral to receive a strange device, which works similarly to the enchanted key (must have Making History quest completed).

cryptics.text: Come brave adventurer, your sense is on fire. If you talk to me, it's an old god you desire.
cryptics.answer: Speak to Viggora. He can be found in three locations, but players can only make progress by speaking to him in the location he was spoken to during the Curse of the Empty Lord miniquest. He can be found at one of the following locations: Paddewwa, Edgeville Dungeon, near the earth warriors. 1st floor[UK] of the Rogues' Castle in the deep Wilderness. 1st floor[UK] of the Canifis Slayer Tower, just before the Infernal Mage. A ring of visibility and ghostspeak amulet are required to make progress through the clue.

cryptics.text: Darkness wanders around me, but fills my mind with knowledge.
cryptics.answer: Speak to Biblia on the Arceuus Library's top floor.

cryptics.text: Dig in front of the icy arena where 1 of 4 was fought.
cryptics.answer: Where you fought Kamil from Desert Treasure, dig north east of the first small rock just past the wolves.

cryptics.text: Faint sounds of 'Arr', fire giants found deep, the eastern tip of a lake, are the rewards you could reap.
cryptics.answer: Dig south of the pillar at the end of the Deep Wilderness Dungeon.

cryptics.text: Falo the bard wants to see you.
cryptics.answer: Speak to Falo the Bard, who is located on the road to the Fremennik Province.

cryptics.text: Fiendish cooks probably wont dig the dirty dishes.
cryptics.answer: Dig by the fire in the Rogues' Den.

cryptics.text: Ghommal wishes to be impressed by how strong your equipment is.
cryptics.answer: Speak to Ghommal with a total Melee Strength bonus of over 100. (Note: Amulet of strength gives +10, even better than a fury for this clue. A Godsword on its own is over 100 Strength bonus.)

cryptics.text: Great demons, dragons, and spiders protect this blue rock, beneath which, you may find what you seek.
cryptics.answer: Dig by the runite rock in the Lava Maze Dungeon.

cryptics.text: Guthix left his mark in a fiery lake, dig at the tip of it.
cryptics.answer: Dig at the tip of the lava lake that is shaped like a Guthixian symbol, west of the Mage Arena.

cryptics.text: Here, there are tears, but nobody is crying. Speak to the guardian and show off your alignment to balance.
cryptics.answer: Talk to Juna while wearing three Guthix related items. Known working items include: Guthix armour, Void Knight equipment, Book of Balance, Guthix Staff, Guthix cape, and Guthix mjolnir.

cryptics.text: Hopefully this set of armour will help you to keep surviving.
cryptics.answer: Speak to Sir Vyvin while wearing white platebody and white platelegs (white full helm is not needed).

cryptics.text: If you're feeling brave, dig beneath the dragon's eye.
cryptics.answer: Dig below the mossy rock under the Viyeldi caves. Requires progress or completion of Legends' Quest. Items needed: Pickaxe, unpowered orb, lockpick (multiple recommended), a rope, a spade, and any Charge Orb spell. A bravery potion is also required if the quest is not completed (You also need any Axe and a Machete to get through the jungle).

cryptics.text: I lie beneath the first descent to the holy encampment.
cryptics.answer: Dig immediately after climbing down the first set of rocks towards Saradomin's Encampment within the God Wars Dungeon. Two ropes are needed; one to enter the dungeon and another to enter Saradomin's Encampment (not required if you've used once before already). 70 Agility is also required (cannot be boosted).

cryptics.text: Kill the spiritual, magic and godly whilst representing their own god
cryptics.answer: Kill a spiritual mage in the God Wars Dungeon - 83 Slayer requirement. Be sure to wear armour corresponding to their god.

cryptics.text: My life was spared but these voices remain, now guarding these iron gates is my bane.
cryptics.answer: Speak to the Key Master in Cerberus' Lair.

cryptics.text: One of several rhyming brothers, in business attire with an obsession for paper work.
cryptics.answer: Speak to Piles in the Resource Area. An entry fee of 7,500 coins is required (6,000 if the medium Wilderness Diary is completed, 3,750 if the hard diary is completed, or free if the elite diary is completed).

cryptics.text: Pentagrams and demons, burnt bones and remains, I wonder what the blood contains.
cryptics.answer: Dig under the blood rune spawn next to the Demonic Ruins.

cryptics.text: Robin wishes to see your finest ranged equipment.
cryptics.answer: Robin at the inn in Port Phasmatys. Speak to him while wearing equipment adding up to 182 ranged attack bonus or over (toxic blowpipes cannot be used for this clue.

cryptics.text: She's small but can build both literally and figuratively, as long as you have their favour
cryptics.answer: Speak to Lovada south of the Lovakengj blast mine.

cryptics.text: Shhhh!
cryptics.answer: Speak to Logosia in the Arceuus Library's ground floor.

cryptics.text: Show this to Sherlock.
cryptics.answer: Sherlock can be found south of Seers' Village. Players will have to perform one of the Sherlock tasks in order to complete this challenge.

cryptics.text: South of a river in a town surrounded by the undead, what lies beneath the furnace?
cryptics.answer: Dig in front of the Shilo Village furnace.

cryptics.text: The far north eastern corner where 1 of 4 was defeated, the shadows still linger.
cryptics.answer: Dig on the northeastern-most corner of the Shadow Dungeon. Bring a ring of visibility.

cryptics.text: This place sure is a mess.
cryptics.answer: Ewesey is located in the Hosidius mess hall.

cryptics.text: Under a giant robotic bird that cannot fly.
cryptics.answer: Dig next to the terrorbird display in the south exhibit of Varrock Museum's basement.

cryptics.text: Where safe to speak, the man who offers the pouch of smallest size wishes to see your alignment.
cryptics.answer: Speak to the Mage of Zamorak in the Zamorakian chapel south of Aubury's Rune Shop in East Varrock while wearing three items aligned to Zamorak.

coords.location: Southern part of Isafdar, north-east of Tyras Camp. You must have started the Regicide Quest and have level 56 agility to access this area. (The charter ship may be convenient.) Saradomin wizard will attack.
To the West of the Gnome Maze on the river's edge. Directly across the river from the Observatory (not far from Fairy Ring CIQ)
Flax field south of the Lletya bank. The image has the north compass facing east to provide a proper orientation.
South-west of Brimhaven in gold mine (near dungeon entrance)
Just west of Musa Point on Karamja, between the two ponds. Currently blocked by undergrowth, although digging one spot above it finds the clue.
Lumbridge Swamp, directly to the South-east of the Water Altar, about 12 steps to the North of the Southern shore
In Lumbridge Swamp go to the shack for the Lost City (Zanaris), and head slightly north-east until you see an open area with rocks on the ground. It's easy to spot once you see the area.
Near entrance to the Ice caves (and Thurgo's smithing shack), South of Falador and south of Port Sarim
Inside the Observatory office building, north-east corner of the main room
North-west of the Shipyard on Karamja, most north-west tip of the island (near Fairy Ring DKP). Clue scroll (medium).

From the Elven camp in Tirannwn, go South over the log bridge, then West into the area where the rabbits/bears are. Go a little South-west. There's a stick trap there; dig just past the stick trap. You must have started the Regicide Quest and have level 56 agility to access this area. Saradomin wizard will attack.
Moss Giant Island, West of Brimhaven. You need level 10 agility to use the rope swing to get to the island.
In the hunter area directly south of the Elf Camp, past a stick trap, dig by the north-east edge of the pond. An Elf camp teleport can greatly reduce the difficulty in reaching this position.

Island near the Draynor bank and the Wizards tower bridge, two steps north of the fairy ring. Must have started Fairy Tales part II Quest and have access to the fairy ring teleport system. CLP is the teleport code. Zamorak wizard will attack
North of Fight Arena, south of Clock Tower
On the penisula to Hazelmere's house, directly east of Yanille. Use the fairy ring code CLS and run north. Dig between a boulder, a leafy tree, and a creeping plant.
South of Port Tyras, easily accessible by charter ship or fairy ring code BJS (requires 76 Agility
Duel Arena. You'll need someone to duel start a duel with, select obstacles; no Saradomin wizard attack here.
Code DLR at the Poison Waste.
Directly north of the teak tree south-east of Uzer. Can be reached relatively easily via fairy ring DLQ in Nardah by running north and then east following the map border.
Just west of the H.A.M. Headquarters entrance, which you can find in the abandoned house with all the tiny spiders, near the dungeon mark on your minimap.

A bit south of Ardougne, on the East coast, north of the Tower of Life and Necromancer Tower. There's a small outcrop toward the water with a willow tree on it. Dig on the north-east side of the tree.
West of Burgh de Rott near the ruins in the north
Just south-west of Castle Wars, fairy ring code BKP.
Crandor, centre of the island.
North-east of the Nature Altar and the Karamja Jungle mine. Clue scroll (medium).
North edge of the pond in the Kharidian Desert Bedabin camp. (Magic Carpet is very helpful.) Saradomin wizard will attack.
Karamja Jungle mine, to the north-west of the Nature Altar, in the centre of the mining area.
Ogre City, in the centre on the Eastern side. You must have started the Watchtower Quest to access this area. Saradomin wizard will attack.

The coordinates are located on the small island East of Ogre City. Not too far from the South-western corner is a dungeon entrance. Go inside the cave, and you'll instantly appear on the island. No quests are required to get onto the island. Saradomin wizard will attack.
Crandor, near the broken walls and pillars and scorpions toward the north-east. You must have at least started the Dragonslayer Quest to get onto Crandor Island.

Karamja Shipyard, east of the Southernmost house. Dig right against the house wall under the east window. The password to the Shipyard is ka-lu-min, but you must have started the Grand Tree Quest to access this area. Saradomin wizard will attack.

Arandar, South of the winding path to Prifddinas, amidst the red spider egg spawns. You must have at least started the Regicide Quest and have level 56 agility to access this area. Saradomin wizard will attack.
Located outside the entrance to the Meiyerditch Mine. An easy way to reach the mine is to get caught by a vyrewatch, get sent to the mines, and then mining 15 daeyalt ores to leave.
In Feldip Hills, north of the fairy ring (AKS), between the two rockslides, north-west of Rantz

Mort Myre Swamp, on the Nature Grotto island, just North of the tree. You must have started the Nature Spirit Quest to get into Mort Myre Swamp. If you bring food, bring druid pouch(es). Saradomin wizard will attack. Note: You cannot use familiars on the island, as it is a Summoning free zone.
North of the windmill between north of Lumbridge, inside the fenced area with the cows. South-east side of the bridge spanning the river to Varrock.
Cairn Isle, inside the ruined building. Saradomin wizard will attack.
In the Kharidian desert to the West of the Bandit camp, on the tip of the peninsula. Dig 3 steps to the West of the cactus with white spikes. Saradomin wizard will attack.
Karamja Jungle, south-west of glider area towards the river where the jogres are. Saradomin wizard will attack.
South-west outside the Gnome Stronghold, at the 3 ponds (north of the Ancient Gate to Arandar). Dig between the two most Eastern ponds.

Mort Myre Swamp, directly across the river from the digsite, well south and west of the swamp gate entrance, one pond South of the fishing spots pond. Find the dead tree and dig next to it. You must have started the Nature Spirit Quest to get into Mort Myre Swamp. If you bring food, bring druid pouch(es).
Peninsula South of Taverley tree patch, on the peninsula near the Lady of the Lake from Merlin's Crystal Quest.
The graveyard where players fight Dessous during Desert Treasure.
South edge of Kharazi Jungle pond. You must have started the Legends Quest to get into the Kharazi Jungle, and carry a machete and hatchet. Saradomin wizard will attack.

Mort Myre Swamp, across the river from the digsite, straight south of the swamp gate entrance, north-east of the fishing spots pond. You must have started the Nature Spirit Quest to get into Mort Myre Swamp. If you bring food, bring druid pouch(es). Saradomin wizard will attack.
South-east of the easternmost mahogany tree in the Kharazi Jungle. Remember to bring an axe and a machete (and your Radimus notes if you have not finished Legends' Quest) to cut through the jungle.
South-east edge of Feldip Hills, by the crimson swifts. South-east of fairy ring AKS.
Next to the ladder on the Water Obelisk Island.

Kharazi Jungle, on the small peninsula in the most South-western corner. Dig 2 steps North of the corpse. You must have started the Legends Quest and bring a machete and hatchet to get into the Kharazi Jungle. Saradomin wizard will attack.

Inside the Tree Gnome Stronghold, on the other side of the river to the West. Cross the bridge into the terrorbird enclosure, and go out the north-eastern gate. Dig a little to the South-east of the gate towards the water.

Baxtorian Falls, on the second island in the river, bring a rope. Use a raft to get to the first island, then use a rope with the rock on the second island to get to the second island. Dig next to the dead tree. You must have at least started the Waterfall Quest to get to the second island. Clue scroll (medium).
This is on the west side of the river in the Gnome Stronghold. Walk north of the terrorbird pen and dig right above the rock.
Ice Mountain to the North of the Dwarven Mine entrance, centre of the Southern side of the mountain amongst the icefiends.
Inside Seer's Village bank, in front of the third stall from the east.

Morytania, south of the Slayer tower, a little to the East of the gate in the fence, near a double root sticking out of the ground. You must have completed the Priest in Peril Quest to get into Morytania. Clue scroll (medium).
Tree Gnome Stronghold, in the toad and worm swamp north-west of the Grand Tree
On the path to the Slayer Tower, just before the entrance. Easily reached by teleporting with fairy ring code CKS
North-east of Eagles' Peak. Dig on the eastern side of the fence just slightly south of the coniferous tree. Easily reached by teleporting with the fairy rings with code AKQ
Burthorpe, east of the quest tent and south of the agility tutorial area, two step east of the blue-gray flag.
In the castle grounds of Fenkenstrain's Castle in Morytania. Dig two steps north of the northernmost door.
By the Obelisk of Air in the Wilderness. Must be accessed through the Edgeville Dungeon.

North-east of the Air Obelisk (reached by travelling through wilderness section of Edgeville dungeon.) It's 3 paces east of the ladder. Beware of player-killers, this is level 7 wilderness. Zamorak wizard will attack.
As far as you can go east in level 9 Wilderness, north-west of the Slayer Tower on the map.
Eastern shore of Crash Island.
Level 11 Wilderness, North of Edgeville. Trees south-west of the Wilderness Volcano, near the bronze arrow respawns and the bears. Dig in the middle of the 4 mushrooms. Zamorak mage will attack.
Dig on top of the starfish on the south-westernmost shore of Ape Atoll.
Dig in the graveyard just east of the hill giants west of the Shayzien House bank in Great Kourend. Easily reached by teleporting with the fairy rings with code DJR
South-west side of the swaying lyre tree east of Rellekka, north-west of golden apple tree, south-west of mountain camp
In Pontak's garden in south-eastern Rellekka, between the cabbages and the potatoes. Easily reached by teleporting with the lyre or Fremennik sea boots.
Near the entrance to Mad Eadgar's cave at the peak of Trollheim. You must have started the Troll Stronghold Quest to reach this area. Saradomin wizard will attack.
On top of Trollheim, 2 steps north of the cave, between the rocks. Saradomin mage will attack.
In the Graveyard in level 20 wilderness, dig 1 step north of the middle-east tree. Zamorak mage will attack

Troll camp west of Trollheim, at the top of the ramp leading into the Stronghold itself. Dig slightly south of the cave entrance into the Stronghold. You must have started the Troll Stronghold Quest to reach this area. Saradomin wizard will attack.
Next to the sleeping troll west of Trollheim on the road to the Troll Stronghold. Saradomin mage will attack.
Level 22 Wilderness, north of the black salamander Hunter area, East of the Boneyard and south of Clan Wars arena itself. Dig near the centre of the 3 volcanoes. Zamorak mage will attack.
By the lizardman shaman area west of Lizardman Canyon.
Level 23 Wilderness, south of the lake at the Bandit Camp, dig at the north side of the western spear wall, against the west side of the wall. Zamorak mage will attack.
Near dock outside Rellekka to the north-east, west of the quest start point, on a seaweed spawn at the water's edge. Saradomin mage will attack.
On top of Waterbirth Island. Must be accessed through the dungeon. A pet rock/another player and a rune thrownaxe are required to reach the island's summit.
Level 28 Wilderness Ruins located between the Wilderness volcano and the Boneyard areas. Clue is north of the eastern building. Zamorak Mage will attack.
Level 29 Wilderness, South-west section of the Forgotten Cemetery, where the level 2 men are. Zamorak mage will attack.
Level 31 Wilderness, in the hobgoblin mine, 3 steps north of the last coal of the south-east 4-coal spot
Level 32 Wilderness, dig on the steel dagger spawn south of the Demonic Ruins.

Level 35 Wilderness, between Clan Wars and Red Dragon Isle, north of "Eastern" Ruins and Graveyard of Shadows. There are Chaos Dwarves and rocks. Dig in the middle of the 4 large, white rocks. Zamorak mage will attack.

(North of the Moss Giants) in level 36 Wilderness north of the Wilderness volcano (former Bounty Hunter Minigame), south-west of Red Dragon Isle, south-east of Lava Maze. The exact spot is a little to the North of the small pond. Zamorak mage will attack.
Level 36 Wilderness, Hobgoblin Mine. Three steps west of the large cluster of iron rocks forming the east edge. Zamorak Mage will attack.
Altar South of Ice Giants in level 38 Wilderness, south-west of Lava Maze, outside of the building on the far West (south-western) side. Zamorak Mage will attack.
North-west of The Forgotten Cemetery, at level 38 Wilderness, there is a Chaos Temple. Dig inside the building. A cemetery teleport can be used to reach the coordinates relatively quickly.
North-West of Pirates' Cove
On Fossil Island, east of the Museum Camp.
Inside the Lesser Demon pen on the West side of the Lava Maze in level 41 Wilderness, about 2 steps South-west of ladder. Zamorak Mage will attack.
In the Arceuus essence mine. Easily reached with the fairy ring code CIS, but requires paying Trossa 80,000 coins to unlock.
On Lunar Isle, dig on the island west of the astral altar.
Northern area of the sulphur mine in Great Kourend's Lovakengj House.
Miscellania, on the path to the northern mining area. Dig right before the end of the path. You must have completed the Fremennik Trials Quest to take the boat to Miscellania.
Rune rocks in level 46 Wilderness, on the North side of the Lava Maze. Dig on the West side of the northernmost rock. Zamorak Mage will attack.
Demonic ruins in level 47 Wilderness, north of Clan Wars. Dig inside the building, one pace south of the burnt bones next to the large rib cage. Zamorak Mage will attack.
Penguin Island north of Miscellania, Fairy Ring code AJS, north-east corner of the small island. Saradomin wizard will attack

Rogues' Castle in level 53 Members Wilderness, directly to the North of the North tower. Be on the lookout for the level 305 Chaos Elemental, who likes to hide on the West side of the Castle. Get too close, and he will attack you! Zamorak Mage will attack when you dig.

North of the entrance to the Ardougne Teleport House area (Deserted Keep) in level 55 Members Wilderness. Dig a little to the north-east of the cobweb. Remember to bring a knife or a slash weapon to cut the cobwebs at the entrance. Zamorak Mage will attack.
North-west corner outside the Pirate's Hall in level 56 Members Wilderness, facing the water. Zamorak Mage will attack.
Wilderness Agility Course, Players can boost their Agility to enter it.
North-west outside the level 56 Members Wilderness agility course, towards the northern edge, close to the fence and the water. Zamorak Mage will attack.
Axe Hut in level 56 Members Wilderness, located north-east of Ardougne teleport lever area; one step West outside the North door. Zamorak Mage will attack.
South of Witchhaven, to get there use fairy rings with AIR
North of graveyard in Mortanyia (graveyard of desert treasure)
Wilderness Agility course, level 55 wilderness
Far middle-east side of Crash Island, between the three trees
Inside the Legends guild, north of the fountain
Dig on the hill north-west of the Exam Centre.
Located at the north-east fence outside of Draynor Manor, on the southern side of the River Lum.
Island north-west of Mos Le'Harmless. Go through the Mos Le'Harmless caves with a lightsource! Once you enter the caves, run all the way north-east to the ladders

Small island located north-east of Mos Le'Harmless, accessible through the eastern staircase located at the north-east corner of the Mos'Le Harmless Caves. Remember to wear a Witchwood icon when traversing the dungeon, as well as bringing a light source.
Crandor, centre of the island.
Wilderness Resource Area (3 steps north of fire)
Inside the Resource Area, near the anvil. Requires 7,500 coins to enter.
Outside Rogues' Castle, north of the Wilderness Obelisk.
Sinclair Mansion just South East of the Door leading to the house
Dragontooth Island, dig south-east of the most north-western tree
North-west of Elf Camp near some rabbits. East of Shark fishing spot.
On top of a cliff to the west of Pollnivneach.
Level 56 wilderness, north-east corner of the Wilderness Volcano
East side of Harmony Island. It is suggested to bring Ranged equipment as it is possible an Armadylian guard will appear.
Level 47 wilderness, few steps west of the Fountain of Rune
Small island located north of Fossil island. Only reachable via the rowboat found in the north-east corner of the Mushroom Forest.
Meiyerditch, the player must have started the Darkness of Hallowvale quest
Lunar Isle, Outside the western wall
Wilderness Volcano at level 51 Wilderness.
Neitiznot island, few steps west of the eastern watchtower
North-west of Trollheim, near the ice gate of desert treasure quest. Dig north of the western rock
Penguin island north of Relekka, dig at the most north-western part of the island
South-east of castle wars inside the ruins, one step south of the flag
In the middle of the hut in north-west Shilo village
East of the eastern entrance to Prifddinas.
North of Menaphos
By the shore line north of the Coal Trucks.
Between the magic trees north of Logava Gricoller's Cooking Supplies. Easily accessible by using Xeric's talisman to teleport to Xeric's Glade.
South-west of pirates' cove, must have started Lunar Diplomacy

Dig on the rocks, north of the wrecked ship, outside of Port Phasmatys. Climb the ladder of the wrecked ship, cross the gangplank, and jump on the rocks until the end is reached. Each jump requires 5% of your running energy.

Dig on the rocks, north of the wrecked ship, outside of Port Phasmatys. Climb the ladder of the wrecked ship, cross the gangplank, and jump on the rocks until the end is reached. Each jump requires 5% of your running energy.
Level 40 Wilderness, in the Lava Dragon Isle. An Anti-dragon shield or Antifire potion is recommended to bring for some protection against Lava dragon Dragonfire attacks.
By the lake north of the Mountain Camp in the Fremennik Province
In the black salamander hunting area in the level 23 Wilderness.
Inside the Hardwood Grove at Tai Bwo Wannai. You will need 100 trading sticks for this.
Witchaven, east of Ardougne, dig east of the church
Zeah, Lovakengj House. Few steps south of the large fireplace south-east of the Lovakite mine
Zeah, Arceuus House. Inside the house with the altar sign, three npc's will attack with all three combat styles

In the west end of the Lizardman Canyon between Great Kourend's Lovakengj House and Shayzien House. Entering the Canyon requires 5% favour with the Shayzien House. Use fairy ring code DJR to get there quickly.
East of Burgh de Rott, near the house remains. Few steps south of the pile of bricks, Mage of Saradomin will attack
